biotools.summary:
Automated Identification of Cellulases From Metagenomic Data and Characterization Based on Temperature and pH Dependence.

Using a sequence similarity-based annotation and an ensemble of a support vector classifier and a multi-layer perceptron, MCIC (metagenome cellulase identification and classification) aims to identify and classify cellulolytic enzymes from a given metagenomic data as well as any other amino-acid sequence on the basis of optimum temperature and pH.

bioschemas.name: MCIC
